Comment: A descriptive name for the BOM.
How the output item is priced. 0 = Priced by total. 1 = Priced by components.
Stock code of the BOM's output item.
This field is set to 'Y' if the BOM's "Hide lines on reports" option is ticked.
Any notes recorded for the BOM.
This field contains 'Y' if the BOM is active; otherwise it is inactive.
The type of BOM. Will be one of:K = KitB = BuildO = Order Template
Applies to Build type BOMs. This field is set to 'Y' if the BOM's "AutoBuild" option is ticked. This gives the option of building an out-of-stock BOM immediately instead of placing it on backorder.
